articles.title: Summer Lunch Menu By Mark Best
articles.description: AEG ambassador Mark Best’s summer eats are guaranteed to help you make the most of the warmer weather and entertaining at home.

articles.title: A Traditional Christmas Eve, Mark Best Style
articles.description: One of Australia’s best chefs and AEG ambassador, Mark Best, shares his favourite Christmas Eve menu which is sure to impress your guests.

articles.title: Taking Taste Further
articles.description: This exclusive cookbook gives you all the know-how you need. We’ve designed it to make sure you get the most out of our products - and the best out of your food.
